import React from 'react'; import './Form.css'; const Form = ( { onNombreChange, onApellidoChange, onEmailChange, onTelefonoChange, onEmpresaChange, onPresupuestoChange, onDeadlineChange, onMensajeChange, onPoliticaChange, onSumbitSignIn, onRouteChange} ) => { let formControl = "form-control"; if ( onEmpresaChange.touchEmpresa && !onEmpresaChange.errorEmpresa) { formControl = 'form-control form-error'; } else { formControl = 'form-control'; } return (
